explains: vt. 使……重新调整；使……重新适应

sentences.en: Once again he had to readjust to living alone.
sentences.cn: 他又一次不得不重新适应单独居住。

sentences.en: I can understand why astronauts find it difficult to readjust to life on earth.
sentences.cn: 我能明白为什么宇航员们发现难以重新适应地球上的生活。

sentences.en: Readjust your watch. You are now on Moscow time.
sentences.cn: 校准你的手表。你现在正处于莫斯科时间。
